ygData.subject: Re: Lens Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is my personal theory: I belive that becuase of Bidl Frugrin not being implemented yet, the quest was not finished. With this patch they might have put
ygData.messageBody:
Here is my personal theory: I belive that becuase of Bidl Frugrin not being
implemented yet, the quest was not finished. With this patch they might have
put Bidl in, as I have heard, and have made the other two gnomes actually
give the lenses when you talk to them. I have heard that Bidl will be
located as a random spawn in one of the Faydarks. I have also heard that to
get the other two lenses, you MUST kill the gnomes. In this new patch, they
might have fixed it, but has anyone ever tried comeing back in two weeks?
You know that the world of Norrath actually has time, right? Just type /time
to see what time it is in the game. So maybe if you came back in exactly two
weeks, they'd give it to you. I don't know, we will have to see what changes
have been made when the servers come back up.

Sniffledoo Copperheart 14th rank warrior of the Gemchopper Hall --
Veeshan


>Well, this is my first post, someone told me about this, and I was
>thrilled! Anyhow, on to the good stuff. I have put over 200p into
>Tinkering (i'm a lvl 22 magician), creating flameless lanterns. That's
>INCLUDING the $$ i get back from selling them. I have yet to raise a skill
>level..=( This makes me wonder if I will get through 1000p and still not
>raise it a point.
>
>On the quest for the lenses. I have tried it myself, and have had little
>success. First of all I ask the gnome right outside akanon, and he tells
>me i'm too experienced. The one in Fay says that I have to come back in
>two weeks. I am not high enough to kill either of them and take the lens.
>I got the third lens from the DE in freeport, I killed her (she was blue
>dangerous).
>
>But, I would not stop there, so I went back to steamfont, and tried to
>discover WHO the gnomes would actually give the lens to. Well, I tried lvl
>4 magician, lvl 7 wizard, lvl 8 wizard, lvl 11 magician. They all were
>told to come back two weeks later. Then i tried a lvl 13 Wizard, who was
>told he was too experienced! Argh! If any of you have gotten the lens
>from them, what class/lvl where you? Unfortunately I cannot kill either of
>the gnomes, neither do I want to, as it would ruin my standing with my own
>race. Any advice?
>
>On one last note, hoping that since Bidl Frufrun was being fixed during
>last test server, that he will be repaired for this patch. Not sure if
>he'll be in Steamfont as he is supposed to be, or if he'll be in The
>Fayder's as the Guide mentioned earlier. I may just go runnin
>Steamfont/Fay's offering a reward for anyone who can find Bidl....heh.
>Anyhow, hope this all helps, and would like some help myself!
>
>Xalastile
>Lvl 22 Magician
>Xegony
